resource_requirements.cpus: Number of CPUs and CPU cores on the system determined by `parallel --number-of-cpus` and `parallel --number-of-cores`
resource_requirements.memory: Memory usage depends on the specific commands being run
resource_requirements.storage: Storage requirements depend on the size of the input data and output files

details.input_data: Input data can be provided as arguments on the command line or from an input file
details.output_data: Output data is typically written to files or printed to the console
